description: Controls an entity's ability to perform voluntary movement. Contains a lock that can be set by other systems (like the intimacy mod) to temporarily prevent actions such as 'go' or 'follow'.

locked.description: If true, voluntary movement actions are blocked for the entity. Systems can set this to 'freeze' a character in place. Forced movement (e.g., teleports, knock-back) ignores this flag.

forcedOverride.description: Reserved for future use. A potential mechanism for special actions to bypass the 'locked' state.
